name: TempraBlock
description:
TempraBlock is a stressfull platformer where you need to keep an eye on your temprature. After each round you may spend the yellow points you earned during the round to upgrade your skills!

Controls

[A & left Arrow] Go left

[D & right Arrow] Go right

[W & up Arrow & Space] Jump

[Double W & Double up Arrow & Double Space] Double jump (needs to be unlocked first)

Credits

Everything was made by me (except the font)  using:

Auxy Pro, Affinity designer, Godot and Pixelorama.

This game was made for the Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1

Theme: Temprature is key.
